title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: local LLM runner with a built-in model library (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) and a simple CLI/API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm package ollama.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you plug any Ollama model into chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library published to Maven Central; sync & async APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style autocomplete & chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub; docker run ollama/ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF Q&A, voice chat, function-calling, fine-tune adapters, etc.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package & module for declarative Ollama installs on NixOS with GPU drivers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cpp-py
summary: Low-level Python bindings exposing Ollama’s C++ inference backend for embedding in apps.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama with context-aware chat sessions and model management.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models with optional thread follow-ups.
